snippet: The online publisher, with a quickly growing portfolio of lifestyle and news brands, will announce on Monday that it has just closed a $46.5 million round of financing from General Atlantic, a New York investment firm.
abstract: Vox Media will announce that it has closed $46.5 million round of financing from New York investment firm General Atlantic; investment values company at $380 million, and comes at time when digital-media companies are suddenly of interest to venture-capital firms.
lead_paragraph: The online publisher, with a quickly growing portfolio of lifestyle and news brands, will announce on Monday that it has just closed a $46.5 million round of financing from General Atlantic, a New York investment firm.

headline.main: Vox Media Valued at Nearly $400 Million After Investment
headline.print_headline: An Online News Start-Up Is Valued at $380 Million After an Investment
